name: Dr. Farhan Ahmed
comment: The Google Calendar Sync feature of DocSchedule is amazing! My entire week's schedule updates automatically. No chance of missing any appointments.

name: Sadia Islam
comment: I can easily book real-time slots from home. Receiving an email confirmation and a 2-hour pre-checkup reminder is just fantastic!

name: Dr. Nabila Haque
comment: Patients can now upload their old reports during booking. I can review their medical history even before they enter my chamber. It saves so much time.

name: Kamal Hossain
comment: The telemedicine feature is super helpful. I received the Google Meet link right after booking and had a smooth video consultation from home.

name: LifeCare Clinic
comment: Managing 5 specialists in our clinic used to be a hassle. With DocSchedule's multi-tenant system, we can track appointments and revenue from a single dashboard.

name: Dr. Rifat Hasan
comment: The Patient Intake Form allows parents to write down symptoms beforehand, helping me provide faster and more accurate treatments.

name: Tariqul Islam
comment: Paying the doctor's fee is incredibly smooth. I paid via Stripe during booking and received a digital receipt instantly.

name: Dr. Mahmudul Hasan
comment: Thanks to automated email reminders via Resend, the 'no-show' rate at my chamber has dropped significantly. Truly a lifesaver.

name: Anika Tabassum
comment: The UI is very clean and intuitive. Checking doctors' profiles, degrees, and experiences helped me choose the right specialist easily.

name: Dr. Shafiqur Rahman
comment: I absolutely love the admin dashboard. I can view my daily patient count and earnings analytics with just one click.

name: Tasnim Chowdhury
comment: Booked an appointment for my mother. The ability to upload previous prescriptions securely beforehand is a very thoughtful feature.

name: Dr. Imran Khan
comment: I can manage my shift hours very flexibly. This software has digitized my practice and cut my chamber management workload in half.
